extendedInfo.description: a pair up memory game of popsicle theme, besides 3 classic level, we also present with two unique modes such as cards exchange and cards holding. a fun memory training game for all ages.Instructionï¼At the beginning of memory game all cards are laid face down. Two cards (pair) are flipped face up over each turn. If pair of those two cards are the same then they left open, othervise they are turned face down again.The goal of the memory game is to turn over all matching pairs of matching cards within time limit.Provide 5 difficulty levels, include special card exchange and card lock mode.Each level contain 10 sub-level, time limit decrease 10 seconds for every sub level.Card exchange:2 holding cards change places randomly whenever you figure out a pair.Card lock: in every sub-levels, there is 2 cards always face down and can not be flipped over, you only can guess them by deduction.Keywords: Match up , Puzzle game , Memory game , Pairs , Free game, popsicle , kid game ,Memory Card.
